Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Emergency lighting system failure. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 18/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
